channel.title: EliteScape V3 718/753 - Hybrid 803+ (VPS Hosted/DoubleDrop-XP/UniqueFeatures!)
channel.description:
[B]The Official New "EliteScape" V3 Release[/B] [U]718+ Client Running On 753 Cache[/U]
(Shout - Out To Fox, Foxtrot - For Sharing This Source Its Amazing ! Thanks Alot AKA Rune-Evo V3) Fresh Source Download Here -> [URL=http://"https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=657559.0"]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=657559.0[/URL]
[B]PENDING UPDATES:[/B] V3 - Grand Exchange V2 - Buying/Selling/Sets/History Is Fully Working. V3 - Some NPC's Will Be Removed Due To Grand Exchange, Also A Few Will Be Left For New People. V2 - New Donator Zone. V2 - Removing Useless Object - Such As Doors - Trapdoors - Chairs/Tables - Nulls ETC. V2 - Adding In More Expensive And Working Pendants/XP Lamps Into Squeal of Fortune. V2 - Godwars Drop Rates Will Be At 65% Then Dropping Once More People Start To Play. V3 - Lobby V3 - Slayer Master Will Be Fully Fixed - More NPC's And More Rewards V3 - MOAR DUNG WEAPONS!!!
[B]RECENT UPDATES: [/B] V2 - Grand Exchange V1 - Buying Dosen't Work, But Selling Does V2 - Renamed Shops And NPC's V2 - Fixed Starter Items - Now The Stuff You Get Is Now USABLE! V2 - New Home V2 - Portal - Teleports You To Any Skilling/Training/Minigame/Bosses Around EliteScape V2 - Null Items To Make The Home Look Better V2 - Noticeboard - Change Your Name/Appearance/Password ETC V2 - Java Crown Rank Has Been Added Into The Cache V2 - LeaderBoards - For PvP (List Of The Recent Fights.. K/D Ratio -- ETC.) V2 - Permanant Bonfire (Good For Training Firemaking At Home!) V2 - Rank Login's - Shows What Rank People Are When They Login V2 - Re-Editing Bonuses Making A Few Weapons/Armour O P! V2 - Grand Exchange V1 - Buying/Selling Is Fully Working. V2 - Shops Are Fully Updated All Prices And Grand Ex Prices Are Customized And Synced To Real RS Prices. V2 - Dungernerring Shop Has More Rewards/Weapons To Purchase At Home! V3 - New Donator Zone/Items [B]EliteScape V3 Re-Release [/B]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/28ip1l4.jpg[/img]
____________________________________________________ [B]Server Information And Highlights![/B]
Our Server Is Online 24/7 And VPS Hosted With A 200MB/s Net Connection (No Lag) Our Server Is Password Encrypted With SHA-1 To Protect Players Account 100% Our Server Is New So It Currently Isn't Very Active With Only 4 People On A Day. New Players Get 3 Days Donator Trail As A Welcome Present. View Other Players Stat's By Right Clicking On Them! HD Graphics, Full Screen, Resizable And Fixed Options (DirectX12 Support, OpenGL Support) Dedicated Server Specs: 4GBs RAM, Nvidia 9600 GT Geforce GPU Overclocked, Quad Core Overclocked, 500Watt PSU, 64Bit OS ____________________________________________________ [B]Bossing Information - PVM Stuff[/B]
Boss Contracts, To Influence More Bossing! (Coming Soon!) - Contracts offer large rewards for killing the contract - only need to kill boss once to complete contract - Fully Working Queen And King Black Dragons - Fully Working Corporal Beast - Fully Working Godwars, With Minions Spawned - Fully Working Tormented Demons - Fully Working "Hati The Wolf" Get Rare Drops ! (Cosmetic Items) - Fully Working Glacors - Our Server Is Mostly PvM Based But! PvP Works Just As Good! ____________________________________________________ [B]Misc Information[/B]
- Now has Flawless switching (a shitload faster than matrix's) - to make this fast, you only needed to remove the garbage cache system -.- - Outstanding Graphics, Re-Worked RuneScape Areas! - Fully Working Noob Freindly Interface!!! - 735/803 Items And Interface!!! - Fully Working Bank Tabs! You Can Now Create Tabs In Your Bank! - We Have Teleport Lodestones! So its Much Easier To Travel Around The World! - New Banner Messages To Show Where You Are! - Working Friends Chat! (Clan Chat Coming Soon!) (Clan Citadel Coming Soon!) - Regular Updates To Keep The Server From Bugs/Glitches And Also Improving It! - Great Community, Need More Staff, Need A Few More Active Members! - Godsword Creation, Spirit Shield Creation, Friends Chat Creation. - Grand Exchange Coming Soon! (Items Are Limited, Mostly Grand Ex is Just There For Food, Tools, Misc Items.) - Comp/ Max Cape Customization! ____________________________________________________ [B]Skilling Information[/B]
[B]High/Low Alching + Enchanting[/B]
- High alch produces more profit than low - Enchant jewelry
[B]Working Skills[/B]
- Attack, Strength, Defence, Range, Prayer (Gilded Altars), Magic, Runecrafting, Construction, Constitution, Agility, Herblore, Thieving, Crafting, Flecthing, Slayer, Hunter, Mining, Smithing, Fishing, Cooking, Firemaking, Woodcutting, Summoning. 80% Most Skills Working. - 200m Skill Capes!! AKA "Master Capes"!!!!!
[B]Skills That Do Not Work[/B]
- Dungeonerring And Farming Need Abit More Work.
[B]Skilling Rewards[/B]
- Each skill action you gain 1 skill point - Skill Point shop to get exp boosting items ____________________________________________________ [B]Automated Double XP/Drop Weekends![/B]
- Friday to Sunday - Australian Timezone - We Have Double XP And Drop Weekends!!! So Get Bossing/Skilling On The Weekend With Everyone And Get Lucky At Drops Or That 200m XP! ____________________________________________________ [B]Super Easy Fight Caves[/B]
- 3 Waves, Once You Kill JAD You Get Both Fire And Tok-haar Cape! ____________________________________________________ [B]Item Information[/B]
- Awesome Rares Like - Fish Mask, Party Hats, Christmas Tree Hats, H'Ween Mask's, Dragon Mask's, Santa Hat's, Half A Jug Of Wine!! And Many More! - Steadfast Boots, Ragefire Boots, Glavien Boots, Celestial, Primal, Chaotics, Gravite! - Spirit Shields, Godswords - (Superior) Tetsu,(Superior) Seasinger, (Superior) Death Lotus, Drygores - And Offhands!, Trova, Pernix, Virtus, Third-Age, Cosmetics, Custom Weapons Like Chaotic Claws And 300+ More Weird Stuff!!! ____________________________________________________ [B]Custom Title Handler[/B]
- Most titles have requirements that need to be met to unlock - Once requirement is met, they're automatically unlocked ____________________________________________________ [B]Loyalty Points[/B]
- Awarded 250 points every 30 minutes - Custom titles for loyal members - Auras (standard matrix feature) ____________________________________________________ [B]Squeal of Fortune[/B] - Correct background images, not all messed up - Awarded 2 spins every 24 hours - Works perfect, no known bugs except one where one item doesn't appear on SoF ____________________________________________________ StopForumSpam Integration - stops players from logging in with a blacklisten IP address - good for stopping players trying to proxy to get in after ip banned
[U][I][B]~Description Has Yet Heaps To Be Added![/B][/I][/U] _____________________________________________ [B]How To Play[/B]
EliteScape V2 Client Download Our Latest Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/l9lkyao3wusuw2a/EliteScape+v1.1.jar]EliteScape V1[/url] _____________________________________________ [B]Our Website[/B]
Visit Our Forums/Website For More Info On Our Server! And Exclusive Update News Feed! _____________________________________________
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2nsmdfl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2yw9t6w.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2yvrtxj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/30kyses.jpg[/img]
[B]Note To TroubleShooters.....[/B] If You Have A Black Screen When You Log In, Or If Its Really Laggy... For EG - Bad Frame Rates.. Play Around With Your Graphic Settings In The Tool Bar... Make Sure Its On "openGL" Not SafeMode Or DirectX - If You Did Not Get Any Starter Items Then Type ";;starter" Then Select What Starter Kit You Want And The Difficulty! - If You Want To Talk To The World Or Anyone Who Is Online Please Join "Elite Dripz" Friends Chat! - If It Takes A While To Check For Updates Please Be Patient, It Can Take Up To A MAX Of 6 Minutes! - Wondering Why Checking For Updates / Downloading Updates Takes So Long? Cause Its Your First Time, Our Shared Cache Is Huge Because Of The Custom's We Inputed! -

item.description:
@EliteIV wrote:

[B]The Official New “EliteScape” V3 Release[/B]
[U]718+ Client Running On 753 Cache[/U]

(Shout - Out To Fox, Foxtrot - For Sharing This Source Its Amazing ! Thanks Alot AKA Rune-Evo V3)
Fresh Source Download Here -> [URL=http://“https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=657559.0”]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=657559.0[/URL]

[B]PENDING UPDATES:[/B]
V3 - Grand Exchange V2 - Buying/Selling/Sets/History Is Fully Working.
V3 - Some NPC’s Will Be Removed Due To Grand Exchange, Also A Few Will Be Left For New People.
V2 - New Donator Zone.
V2 - Removing Useless Object - Such As Doors - Trapdoors - Chairs/Tables - Nulls ETC.
V2 - Adding In More Expensive And Working Pendants/XP Lamps Into Squeal of Fortune.
V2 - Godwars Drop Rates Will Be At 65% Then Dropping Once More People Start To Play.
V3 - Lobby
V3 - Slayer Master Will Be Fully Fixed - More NPC’s And More Rewards
V3 - MOAR DUNG WEAPONS!!!

[B]RECENT UPDATES: [/B]
V2 - Grand Exchange V1 - Buying Dosen’t Work, But Selling Does
V2 - Renamed Shops And NPC’s
V2 - Fixed Starter Items - Now The Stuff You Get Is Now USABLE!
V2 - New Home
V2 - Portal - Teleports You To Any Skilling/Training/Minigame/Bosses Around EliteScape
V2 - Null Items To Make The Home Look Better
V2 - Noticeboard - Change Your Name/Appearance/Password ETC
V2 - Java Crown Rank Has Been Added Into The Cache
V2 - LeaderBoards - For PvP (List Of The Recent Fights… K/D Ratio – ETC.)
V2 - Permanant Bonfire (Good For Training Firemaking At Home!)
V2 - Rank Login’s - Shows What Rank People Are When They Login
V2 - Re-Editing Bonuses Making A Few Weapons/Armour O P!
V2 - Grand Exchange V1 - Buying/Selling Is Fully Working.
V2 - Shops Are Fully Updated All Prices And Grand Ex Prices Are Customized And Synced To Real RS Prices.
V2 - Dungernerring Shop Has More Rewards/Weapons To Purchase At Home!
V3 - New Donator Zone/Items
[B]EliteScape V3 Re-Release [/B]

[B]Server Information And Highlights![/B]

Our Server Is Online 24/7 And VPS Hosted With A 200MB/s Net Connection (No Lag)
Our Server Is Password Encrypted With SHA-1 To Protect Players Account 100%
Our Server Is New So It Currently Isn’t Very Active With Only 4 People On A Day.
New Players Get 3 Days Donator Trail As A Welcome Present.
View Other Players Stat’s By Right Clicking On Them!
HD Graphics, Full Screen, Resizable And Fixed Options (DirectX12 Support, OpenGL Support)
Dedicated Server Specs: 4GBs RAM, Nvidia 9600 GT Geforce GPU Overclocked, Quad Core Overclocked, 500Watt PSU, 64Bit OS

[B]Bossing Information - PVM Stuff[/B]

Boss Contracts, To Influence More Bossing! (Coming Soon!)
- Contracts offer large rewards for killing the contract
- only need to kill boss once to complete contract
- Fully Working Queen And King Black Dragons
- Fully Working Corporal Beast
- Fully Working Godwars, With Minions Spawned
- Fully Working Tormented Demons
- Fully Working “Hati The Wolf” Get Rare Drops ! (Cosmetic Items)
- Fully Working Glacors
- Our Server Is Mostly PvM Based But! PvP Works Just As Good!

[B]Misc Information[/B]

- Now has Flawless switching (a shitload faster than matrix's)
- to make this fast, you only needed to remove the garbage cache system -.-
- Outstanding Graphics, Re-Worked RuneScape Areas!
- Fully Working Noob Freindly Interface!!!
- 735/803 Items And Interface!!!
- Fully Working Bank Tabs! You Can Now Create Tabs In Your Bank!
- We Have Teleport Lodestones! So its Much Easier To Travel Around The World!
- New Banner Messages To Show Where You Are!
- Working Friends Chat! (Clan Chat Coming Soon!) (Clan Citadel Coming Soon!)
- Regular Updates To Keep The Server From Bugs/Glitches And Also Improving It!
- Great Community, Need More Staff, Need A Few More Active Members!
- Godsword Creation, Spirit Shield Creation, Friends Chat Creation.
- Grand Exchange Coming Soon! (Items Are Limited, Mostly Grand Ex is Just There For Food, Tools, Misc Items.)
- Comp/ Max Cape Customization!

[B]Skilling Information[/B]

[B]High/Low Alching + Enchanting[/B]

- High alch produces more profit than low
- Enchant jewelry

[B]Working Skills[/B]

  • Attack, Strength, Defence, Range, Prayer (Gilded Altars), Magic, Runecrafting, Construction, Constitution, Agility, Herblore, Thieving, Crafting, Flecthing, Slayer, Hunter, Mining,
    Smithing, Fishing, Cooking, Firemaking, Woodcutting, Summoning. 80% Most Skills Working.
  • 200m Skill Capes!! AKA “Master Capes”!!!

[B]Skills That Do Not Work[/B]

- Dungeonerring And Farming Need Abit More Work.

[B]Skilling Rewards[/B]

- Each skill action you gain 1 skill point
- Skill Point shop to get exp boosting items

[B]Automated Double XP/Drop Weekends![/B]

- Friday to Sunday - Australian Timezone
- We Have Double XP And Drop Weekends!!! So Get Bossing/Skilling On The Weekend With Everyone And Get Lucky At Drops Or That 200m XP!

[B]Super Easy Fight Caves[/B]

- 3 Waves, Once You Kill JAD You Get Both Fire And Tok-haar Cape!

[B]Item Information[/B]

  • Awesome Rares Like - Fish Mask, Party Hats, Christmas Tree Hats, H’Ween Mask’s, Dragon Mask’s, Santa Hat’s, Half A Jug Of Wine!! And Many More!
  • Steadfast Boots, Ragefire Boots, Glavien Boots, Celestial, Primal, Chaotics, Gravite!
  • Spirit Shields, Godswords
  • (Superior) Tetsu,(Superior) Seasinger, (Superior) Death Lotus, Drygores - And Offhands!, Trova, Pernix, Virtus, Third-Age, Cosmetics, Custom Weapons Like Chaotic Claws And
    300+ More Weird Stuff!!!

[B]Custom Title Handler[/B]

- Most titles have requirements that need to be met to unlock
- Once requirement is met, they're automatically unlocked

[B]Loyalty Points[/B]

- Awarded 250 points every 30 minutes
- Custom titles for loyal members
- Auras (standard matrix feature)

[B]Squeal of Fortune[/B]
- Correct background images, not all messed up
- Awarded 2 spins every 24 hours
- Works perfect, no known bugs except one where one item doesn’t appear on SoF

StopForumSpam Integration
- stops players from logging in with a blacklisten IP address
- good for stopping players trying to proxy to get in after ip banned

[U][I][B]~Description Has Yet Heaps To Be Added![/B][/I][/U]

[B]How To Play[/B]

EliteScape V2 Client
Download Our Latest Client: EliteScape V1

[B]Our Website[/B]

Visit Our Forums/Website For More Info On Our Server! And Exclusive Update News Feed!




[B]Note To TroubleShooters…[/B]
If You Have A Black Screen When You Log In, Or If Its Really Laggy… For EG - Bad Frame Rates… Play Around With Your Graphic Settings In The Tool Bar… Make Sure Its On “openGL” Not SafeMode Or DirectX -
If You Did Not Get Any Starter Items Then Type “;;starter” Then Select What Starter Kit You Want And The Difficulty! -
If You Want To Talk To The World Or Anyone Who Is Online Please Join “Elite Dripz” Friends Chat! -
If It Takes A While To Check For Updates Please Be Patient, It Can Take Up To A MAX Of 6 Minutes! -
Wondering Why Checking For Updates / Downloading Updates Takes So Long? Cause Its Your First Time, Our Shared Cache Is Huge Because Of The Custom’s We Inputed! -
